title: My Dolphin Show 9
description: This gorgeous facility was inspired by the art and culture of several Asian nations. Team up with your dolphin and wow the crowd with some really impressive flips and other tricks in this installment of the popular My Dolphin Show series. You’ll earn tons of coins you can trade in for waterproof kimonos, mawashis, and other really cool outfits!
instructions: PRESS THE LEFT AND RIGHT ARROWS to swim. PRESS THE UP ARROW to rise or leap. PRESS THE DOWN ARROW to dive.

title: impostor Punch
description: İmpostor & Crewmate Boxer game. Hit the impostor but never hit the Human! watch out, don't hit the crewmate. be the one who hits the impostor the most and win. Play alone or for 2 players!
instructions: Right arrow key to hit the Blue Fist & Left arrow key to hit the red fist (Mobile Touch)

title: Happy Hopper
description: Send the Oomee jumping across spinning platforms! Time your jumps to reach the big fruit at the end while collecting smaller fruit for a better score!
instructions: Click or Tap to make the Oomee jump from the platform.

title: Oomee Dance
description: Get ready for a dance off in this match-up puzzler! Try to copy the blue Oomee's dance movements by spinning the totem pole to make your own Oomee dance!
instructions: Click/Tap and Drag the segments of the totem pole to change how the Oomee on the right dances.

title: Archer Hero
description: In this shooter game, you control a character equipped with a bow and unlimited number of arrows! Random enemies will appear and you have to shoot and kill them with your bow before they can kill you. If you are able to score a headshot, enemies will die instantly. The game is level based and as you progress levels will become more difficult, more enemies will appear at the same time and they will become more accurate, so you have to kill them quickly.
instructions: Touch on mobile device or mouse on PC!.

title: Jewels Mine
description: Jewels Mine is a fun match 3 game. Swap and match 3 or more gems of the same type and make points and special power ups. Earn points and compete with your friends and with all other players around the world in the global leaderboards!
instructions: "Mouse" on PC, "Touch" on Smartphone and Tablet

title: Flying Cubic
description: Flying Cubic is a puzzle game and the object of this game is to collect the little rings with the help of a cube that moves up and down the screen. Tap the screen to control the direction of movement of the cube. Avoid the rotating stars, if you touch them the game will end. There are also spikes on the top and bottom of the game that you should also not touch.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play this game.

title: MANEUVER
description: Only a few can players can reach 50 points ! Hypercasual game with one tap control. Break records, feel control and enjoy your skill. Can you stand it?
instructions: Tap or click

title: Zik Zak
description: Have fun with ball rolling on zig zag path in this ZikZak game. Stay on the line and enjoy your exciting ride on zigzag path. Addictive, attractive exciting endless ball rolling game. With ZigZak Curves, check how far and how fast you can go? Simple Game touch based fun filled game. Enjoy this exciting Ball runner game on this hyper casual Zikzak game.
instructions: How to Play: - Tap to change direction left/right while ball is moving - Avoid Edges - Keep Rolling the Ball and Have Fun

title: TRZ Cannon
description: TRZ Cannon is a casual game in which the player must estimate strength and distance to hit cannon shots into baskets to win. The game has more than 100 levels with some small puzzles.
instructions: Touch in the screen and drag to aim. Release to shoot. The ball must enter the baskets

title: No Problamas
description: The time has come to celebrate! There are many lamas on the screen. Once you hit them, there are going to be candies and points for you! There is an angry wolf that would like to end the celebration - don't hit it, cause that would end the game.
instructions: Tap on lamas to smash them for points. You can also swipe your finger on the screen and smash several piniatas at once. The game ends when you touch the wolf.

title: Ice Man 3D
description: Are you willing to stand with the icy superhero, delivering the metropolis from the violent men? Overwhelm your adversaries with your icy mighty powers, and break them into countless pieces!
instructions: Click to control.

title: Mazes
description: Classic Fun filled Brain Puzzle game for perfect time breaker. You will be trapped in the maze and with your smart brain with fast observation you will have to find the right path to escape the maze. Great Experience for exciting levels for all the ages. playing this casual puzzle, maze, labyrinth game when you feel mentally fatigued or need to sharpen your mind. Guide the dot through different routes in this free maze adventure.
instructions: How to play: - Analyze the Start point and end point - Tap on the Object in the direction you wish to move

title: Fruit VS Knife
description: "The ultimate knife challenge is here!"For fans of knife games, Fruit VS Knife provides you the most exciting game play of knife hitting and shooting. Except for the great enjoyment of using the knife to hit, all knife lovers can also expect more throwing fun in Sword hit!Don’t hesitate and throw your knife now!
instructions: Easy to play. Just throw your knife by tap.

title: Color Roller
description: Swipe to move the ball around the puzzle and color the path. Color the puzzle fully to complete the level.A easy to learn but hard to master puzzle game. There are a total of 100 Levels to play.Have fun :)
instructions: 1. Swipe / drag to move the ball around the puzzle.2. Color the entire maze to move to the next level.3. Try to complete the level in the given time.

title: Moving Spheres
description: Moving Spheres is a puzzle game with balls. The goal of this game is to catch the ring with the sphere. The ring must not collide with the sides of the game and fall to the ground. So you have to control it with the sphere or the big circle. Move the sphere to cushion the impact. Try to make a good result. You can drop the ring 3 times, after that the game is over.
instructions: Tap and slide the screen to move the sphere.

title: Archer Peerless
description: This is a archery game with many different ways to play. In the game, players can choose to go it alone or experience a one-of-a-kind battle mode, so come and give it a try!
instructions: Use your mouse to aim and click to shoot!

title: Animals And Star
description: Animals and Star is a very fun game, where your goal is to help the little animals to find all the stars. Total of 40 levels with 4 types of character and different terrains. Will you be able to complete all 40 levels with 3 stars ?!
instructions: Use arrow keys to move or turn Use the touch buttons to move or turn

title: Super Friday Night Funki
description: Have fun with this new game Super Friday Night Funkin 'a new game in this fabulous saga !! Play the ritual of each music, press the game buttons at the right time and accumulate the points to show that you are the best.
instructions: The objective of the game is to press the buttons to the rite of music in each level of this fun new game.

title: Neon Guitar
description: “Neon Guitar” is a musical game designed for everyone's enjoyment. Hit as many notes as fall on the screen to accumulate points and beat your highscores. Great game to train your reflexes and have fun at the same time! The designs are Neon style, very colorful and beautiful! Have a good time!
instructions: Desktop / Keyboard: A-S-K-L / Mouse Desktop / Gamepad: LT-LB-RB-RT Mobile: Touch Buttons on Screen

title: Hamburger
description: Would you like a good hamburger?Plan & Swipe, move the ingredients like cheese, onions, lettuce, tomatoes, etc.Let's make your own special hamburger!
instructions: Plan & Swipe, move the ingredients

title: Philatelic Escape Fauna Album 3
description: Philatelic Escape - Fauna Album 3 is the 3nd episode of series of games about stamp collector. This time your objective is to get inside the next apartment from the address list and find 10 stamps. Like the previous you need to open the front door and enter the room. Walk across the room, click on the items you see on the screen, collect them and use to solve the puzzles.Open the shelves and look for clues for cracking numeric and letter codes. The keys, postage stamps and other items that you are looking for could be hidden in anywhere, so be sure to check every single corner. Use logical thinking, creativity and your brains to solve all puzzles and find 10 stamps.
instructions: Use mouse, click on things around.

title: Oomee Cake
description: Stack the cakes as high as you can! Click to drop the cake ontop of the other cake, but watch out - any cake hanging off the side will get cut off, giving you less room to place the rest of the cakes down!
instructions: Click/Tap: Drop currently moving cake

title: Stupid Chicken
description: At this game you need to feed the chicken to get an egg. Click on the screen for chicken to peck at the food given by the child farmer. You can also eat insects that are near you. After the chicken eats, she can lay an egg. Try to lay more eggs for given time. When the game is over you can change the eggs for more time to play. At that way you can increase your playing time and progress in the game.
instructions: Tap on screen to play.

title: Pokey Woman
description: Stretch your woman and let her reach out to her boyfriend. Be careful about irons because women don't like irons! Play an addictive game that you will enjoy. Enjoy stretching legs of your female character.
instructions: Hold & Drag to stretch woman's leg.

title: One Point
description: Want to test your accuracy and reaction speed? Then try to go through all the levels of the exciting game One Point. In front of you on the playing field will be visible cells in which there will be stationary white balls. Your ball will be located below.
instructions: Use mouse or tap on the screen!

title: Wall Ball 3D
description: Tap the screen to switch the direction of the ball and try not to fall off the edges. Set your high score and try to beat it again and again. How far can you go? Enjoy the game!!! Features: -Fun for all ages, including kids, teens and adults. -Play against your friends. -Good quality and nice interface. -A good game to pass the time. -Game highscores.
instructions: tap to roll the ball avoid to fall

title: Cookie Crunch
description: Cookie Crunch is filled with Tons of fun and challenging candy match3 puzzles! Match 3 cookies & candy in order to clear the board and beat the cookie puzzle! Cookie Crunch match 3 games are free to play and tons of fun! Bring your friends together to break records in this cake quest Play now!
instructions: Match colorful cookies

title: Endless Tree
description: The goal game is to divert all the branches in as long as possible. The player must touch the screen to go right or left. Collect Coins to earn points!
instructions: Touch in the screen to move the bird (right or left)

title: Lucky Toss 3D
description: The new gameplay has been upgraded with fun, the perfect simulation of the real game experience of the loop ring tossing, it is more interesting, and the more realistic and exciting challenge mode makes you love it. What are you waiting for? Hurry up and enjoy the experience with Lucky Toss 3D!
instructions: Slide to toss.

title: Cashier 3D
description: Be the cashier of the best supermarket! Not only are you familiar with knowing the prices of all items, but you also need to be able to get your customers' change as quickly as possible. How do I get the change? You need to calculate how much change according to the change! Pay attention to the allowance of each change!
instructions: Tap to play.

title: SpeedBall
description: Casual but challenging game with one tap control Collect red squares and avoid the darker ones Easy to learn, hard to win Check your skill and break the record Try to stay for 50 points!
instructions: Tap or click

title: VINT
description: Spinning game that requires a good reaction Tap or click to check rotation direction of two balls, collect white pieces and avoid to dark ones Easy to learn but hard to win
instructions: tap or click

title: Dice Push
description: Dice Push is a funny dice arcade match game with 3D stickman models on a platform. If you want to win the match, you need to send as many stickman members as you can to push the green wall to your opponent's side. You are allowed to throw the dice to destroy enemy members!
instructions: Slide to play.

title: Oomee Pop
description: Click or tap the balloons floating in the sky to pop them! Pop every balloon on screen before the time limit runs out to win. Can you beat all 3 levels?
instructions: Click/Tap on Balloon: Pop Balloon

title: Oomee Pinata
description: It's a fruit piñata! Click or tap to squash the giant jungle fruit within the time limit to feed the hungry Oomees below!
instructions: Click/Tap repeatedly: Pop the fruit

title: Tank Hero Online
description: The battle has started. Take your opponent with the cannons and destroy as many tanks as you can before they kill you. Battle against cunning enemies, collect power-ups, and complete more than 100 levels of amazing action. Collect coins and upgrade your war machine with new cannons, bullets and armor to be the leadear.
instructions: Use the mouse and touch to shoot the cannons

title: Domie Love Pranking
description: The goal of the game is to destroy all the tricks through the effects triggered by some props. There is time to think in each level game, but it is a lot. Gold coins can be obtained in the level, which can be used to buy different outfits. There are 100 levels in the game.
instructions: Tap or Click to playing.

title: Get 12
description: Get 12 is new game, addingting, and casual in this game you just need to match same number and when it got matched it become diffferent number, relax and not too long for casual
instructions: Match same number with your mouse.

title: Ball Hit
description: Something is preventing the basketball from going through the hoop. Rotate this, move that, and everything will work out. Help the ball follow the right trajectory and fall through the ring. With each new level, it will be a little more difficult and interesting to get the ball into the basket. Ball Hit – the basketball is flying towards the hoop, what can go wrong?
instructions: Control – adjust the ball’s trajectory by clicking on the obstacles, grabbing and moving them, rotating them with the mouse.

title: The Final Earth 2
description: Build a great city in this vertical city builder in space! Gather resources, then build and research your way to a better future! Grow your city from an exploration ship to a huge metropolis, full of advanced technology. What will you build? The earth has been destroyed, and it's up to your space colony on a tiny world to save humanity! Can you feed, house and entertain everyone and then build the city of your dreams?
instructions: Controls are explained in-game. Select buildings to build on the bottom left, then click/tap to build them in your city. Choose priority workers and other settings with the buttons on the bottom right.

title: A day in the countryside
description: A pleasant and relaxing day in the countryside? You will play the role of a farmer struggling with the cultivation of his fields... and some funny and spiteful animals.
instructions: MOVE: - USE ARROW KEYS - CLICK/TOUCH AND HOLD ON LEFT/RIGHT OF THE CHARACTER ACTIONS: - CLICK/TOUCH ON THE ANIMALS, SOMETHING WILL HAPPEN - USE MOUSE WHEEL TO ZOOM - IN WINTER, CLICK OR TOUCH ON THE SCREEN TO JUMP HOW TO PLAY - TAKE THE MOLES AND SEND THEM TO SLEEP - TAKE THE BLACKBIRDS WITH THE BOMBS AND SEND THEM AWAY - FEED THE CUTE ANIMALS FOR AN EXTRA LIFE - IN WINTER, SAVE SNOWMEN FROM SNOWBALLS

title: Home House Painter
description: Home House Painter is fun addictive arcade puzzle game. Paint the white space on the walls.It can be tricky at time so should have to be make sure that you paint in the right direction.Use arrow keys to paint walls. Play It Now! Features: - Simple to understand. - Hypercasual gameplay. - Touch Controls.
instructions: Use mouse or direction buttons. Paint the white space on the walls.

title: Green Mover
description: Green Mover is a game with 40 levels in which you have to control the green ball and your goal is to collect all the stars in the level. When moving the ball, it will stop only when it collides with a solid. Find the best way!
instructions: Touch screen to move.

title: Roldana
description: In this game you have to get the raw blocks to be processed by the pulleys and then sell them. In your experience you will be able to use in-game money to upgrade the features of the pulleys and blocks.
instructions: Use your mouse or touch in the screen to play

title: Rotation Blast
description: Endless reaction game. Catch the moment and hit the target by rotating ball. Check your reaction and agility! Break the record and look what will happen!
instructions: Tap or mouse click

title: Blob Giant 3D
description: Enjoy a new giant running game named Blob Giant 3D. Rush and touch the same color jellies so that your hero can be huge which will be bigger and bigger until reaching the end. Use the biggest energy to jump to the inflatable cushion. On the other side of the inflatable cushion, your teammates will fly into the air to try to reach the treasure chest under the reaction force of the cushion.
instructions: Slide to move.

title: Colors Run
description: Colors Run is a arcade puzzle game suitable for all ages and perfect for families to enjoy. The goal of this game is to catch the coming colored balls with the ring who is located on the bottom of the game screen. You need to match the color of the ring with coming balls. For that you have buttons with different colors. Click on the colored button to change the color of the ring with that color. Be fast and try to destroy more balls as you can.
instructions: Tap on the colored buttons to play this game.

title: Philatelic Escape Fauna Album 2
description: Philatelic Escape - Fauna Album 2 is the 2nd episode of series of games about stamp collector. This time your objective is to get inside the next apartment from the address list and find 10 stamps. Like the previous you need to open the front door and enter the room. Walk across the room, click on the items you see on the screen, collect them and use to solve the puzzles.Open the shelves and look for clues for cracking numeric and letter codes. The keys, postage stamps and other items that you are looking for could be hidden in anywhere, so be sure to check every single corner. Use logical thinking, creativity and your brains to solve all puzzles and find 10 stamps.
instructions: Use mouse, click on things around.

title: Jump Tower 3D
description: Jump and reach the highest floors of the tower. Compete with your friends and break records in six different worlds! Do not forget about the prickly mechanism that lies in wait for you on the lower floor!
instructions: Control is carried out in one touch, you only need one finger to perform the jump!
